ReplyReportAbuse.name: ReplyReportAbuse
ReplyReportAbuse.description: Represents a user-reported abuse on a Reply in a Chatter Answers zone.

Name.description: The name of the Reply from which the user reported abuse.

Reason.description: The reason the user reported abuse on the Reply, such as Spam, Hateful, or Inappropriate.

ReplyId.description: The ID of the Reply from which the user reported abuse.
